114.content: Where does the embarrassment ensue?

choices: The boys face embarrassment, either from each other or their mother
Cat is embarrassed by her sons
1142.content:
Cat was an adorable milfy dream. Blonde, cute symmetrical face, long legs that lead to her big bubble butt. The only thing loved more than her own reflection was her two boys. Being a single mother with a full time job was no easy task, but she managed to make it work.

Noah and Nolan were cute little boys with dark hair and slim figures. Inseparable mommas boys, trouble makers, and most importantly, pranksters.

Cat was busy looking at a deal on cans of soup while her boys playfully wrestled in the aisle near her. She would intervene if things got too hectic. And things always got too hectic.

In that grocery store anything could happen to this little embarrassment prone family, but what would happen?
1142.title: Grocery store

11423.content:
"AHHHH" Is all Cat heard from the other aisle, then muffled screams. She bowed her head in defeat. She should have known she couldn't leave her sons alone.

info.brief_description: Mother and son characters, be they original or from other series, face embarrassment.
info.description:
The bonds between a mother and son can be very strong. Test these bonds by having them go through embarrassing trials together. Diapers, spankings, wedgies, streaking/general nudity, swirlies and just about whatever else you can think of. Don't kill anybody or
include guro (such as someone having a limb cut off).

You can use characters in a realistic setting or take the fanfiction route and use characters from an established series, such as an anime or video game. You can include write a route about any media series, or start any family dynamic you want with any cast of original characters. Besides the son, there could be no other children, he can have one sibling, three, or even five or more. You can get creative and have other family members live in the house too, like aunts or cousins. Mom and son can be embarrassed at home, school, the park, at camp, or any place you want.

But remember that this interactive is about two characters that are mother and son (they don't have to be biologically related). They don't have to be together at all times, but make sure they are both an important part in whatever route you're writing for. They don't even necessarily have to be humiliated at the same time, just so long as they are both eventually humiliated. Other characters can be humiliated too, but make sure the focus remains on the mother and son.
